name: Remove Grey Footer (MyAnimeList)
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Compatible with other MyAnimeList Stylish themes. Install to remove the giant grey anime stats footer at the bottom of forum, club, and profile pages. See below for removing the blue social media footer too- and for other useful themes to remove or customize parts of MAL.
additional_info: You can also remove the blue footer with this theme: https://userstyles.org/styles/113454/
